ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An alias_identification_item type is an extensible list of alternate data types. It provides a mechanism to refer to instances of the data types included in the types that extend the alias_identification_item type.
This empty extensible select requires extension in a further module to ensure that all entities have at least one valid instantiation.
The type alias_identification_item is not an extension of the type identification_item, defined in the module Identification assignment, because the capability to get an alias may not be needed for every entity type to which the capability to get additional identifiers is provided. By nature, alias_identification_item characterizes a smaller set of entity types than identification_item.

An Alias_identification is a type of Identification_assignment that provides an alias identifier to product or activity data. The alias identifier is conveyed within the identifier attribute inherited from Identification_assignment.
Information about the organizational scope in which the alias applies may be provided by a specialization of Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment.
Alias_identification only applies to concepts that possesses an attribute that conveys an identifier.
is the inherited role attribute gets the value 'alias';
the inherited items attribute shall not contain any element that is not aliasable.
